title: How to Make Lemon Barley Water

steps.headline: Pour the boiling water over the ingredients, in a large pan.
Cover the pan and leave to cool completely.
Strain the ingredients once cold.
steps.description: Use a muslin cloth or a metallic strainer to strain with.

steps.headline: Pour the liquid into a jug.
steps.description: Place in the refrigerator to chill.

steps.headline: Serve once chilled.
steps.description: Garnish with mint leaves and add ice cubes.

text: Pour the boiling water over the ingredients, in a large pan.  Cover the pan and leave to cool completely.  Strain the ingredients once cold. Use a muslin cloth or a metallic strainer to strain with. Pour the liquid into a jug. Place in the refrigerator to chill. Serve once chilled. Garnish with mint leaves and add ice cubes. Finished.
